channel.title: Need tut to add runes to spells!
channel.description: anyone no how to post here if works gets mod on my server

item.title: Need tut to add runes to spells!
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

No tuts that I know of but if your server has free use of runes then you need to find public boolean playerHasItem and make the false one, I won’t say which is false, say return false and not return true. Other then that add the void where your spell is “projectilespell” or something and it’ll have the rune ID part you need in it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need tut to add runes to spells!
